Major news update

Message #1 le 2012-8-14 @ 1:34:11 par Eloctinar:
http://www.titanalliance.net/forums/m/6298484/viewthread/3938245-forewarning

Everyone in the Alliance is aware that we have a No Trolling/No Responding To Trolling Policy. As such we are all aware that in the up and coming weeks there will most likely be major forum drama that we do not wish to spill over into our Alliance.

Again, we will not be responding to any kind of trolling/drama or make negative comments on any of the public forums when this occurs

We will remain dedicated to our sound resolve, and we will continue along strong into release.

Thank you.
